entityInfo.body: literally nothing you can do man

entityInfo.body: one day the sun might turn angry and melt everyone into blobs

entityInfo.title: Special Containment Procedures
entityInfo.body: Keep it connected to power at all times.

entityInfo.title: Description
entityInfo.body: A tumorous, fleshy growth with a volume of roughly 60 meters cubed containing a living room. It eats people and turns them into furniture.
